title: PROJECT Emote Not Working-

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! Are you still having this issue?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=8PaKFo5O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-28T17:47:43.462+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! Are you still having this issue?

The same issue arises when getting new emotes on my other accounts. However, the remedy will only last till I receive/buy a new emote. After a certain amount of time passes it seems to work. Until then, like a greedy king, it refuses your pleads.
Oh dear. ;-; I've tossed this along to the folks who work on this feature, they're looking into it!

I got that error when I first got it.  Have you tried to close and reopen the client?  If so, then just give it some time as that doesn't always seem to work but the emote will work eventually (mine does now)

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=8PaKFo5O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-26T22:45:57.698+0000)
>
> I got that error when I first got it.  Have you tried to close and reopen the client?  If so, then just give it some time as that doesn't always seem to work but the emote will work eventually (mine does now)

Yeah I tried restarting the client and everything and it didn't work. After awhile it let me add it. 
They should really fix this, it happened when I got a emote from a chest too.
Yeah :/ The emote system seems to have a lot of bugs right now.
